Text.Page: Rhodos wanted a way to free the Parthians from the archdevan magic. Tirene, a Mysterium researcher with the Vanguard Initiative, examined an archdevan seal and said it might be possible to save the Parthians. Relieved, Rhodos vowed vengeance against Dakuryon.

Jitt's final words change everything. We can't simply slaughter the Parthians. We must find another way.

I know nothing of magic. Find someone who does and bring me the answer I seek.

If the archdevan spell lifted just before death, we might be able to undo it en masse. There must be a focus, however. That's the key.

The seal! Examine several other fallen Parthians. Retrieve anything that looks out of place.

A malignant power dwells within.

Give me a moment to study it.

I'm an arcanist, but not a soldier.

The magic that transforms someone into a demokron cannot be undone, but we might free these poor people from the archdevas.

Perhaps.

With the aid of the baraka, we must try.

I don't understand magic, but I understood Tirene. There might be hope for my people.

Dakuryon will pay for pitting my brothers against me!
